mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize image sizes and ensure faster loading on mobile devices to improve responsiveness.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider leveraging browser caching and reducing the number of server requests to speed up page loading.

bookingFlowTip: Add a progress indicator during the booking process to make users feel more in control and informed.
